document.masterDocTitle: Checklist of digenean parasites of birds from Argentina

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist of digenean parasites of birds from Argentina

subSubSection.paragraph:
Hosts:
Rollandia rolland chilensis (Lesson)
,
Himantopus melanurus Vieillot
,
Vanellus chilensis lam­
pronotus (Wagler).
Site of infection: ceca.

Localities: Los Talas; Chascomús lagoon and Mar Chiquita coastal lagoon, Buenos Aires Province. Life history: Hi 1 :
Heleobia conexa (Gaillard)
,
H . parchappei (d’Orbigny)
(natural hosts). Hi 2 :
Palaemonetes argentinus Nobili
(experimental and natural host); metacercariae in muscles, gonads, connective tissue.

Material deposited: MLP , 3303 C– 3306 C, USNPC 84905–84908 . References:
Martorelli ( 1988 )
,
Martorelli & Schuldt ( 1990 )
,
Martorelli & Ivanov ( 1996 )
.

Levinseniella ( Monarrhenos ) anenteron (
Szidat, 1964
) Deblock, 1978 Syn.
:
Austromicrophallus anenteron
Szidat, 1964
.

Hosts:
Larus dominicanus Lichtenstein
,
L. maculipennis Lichtenstein . Site
of infection: intestine.
Localities: San Carlos de Bariloche and Nahuel Huapí Lake, Río Negro Province; Huechulaufquen Lake,
Lanín National Park, Neuquén Province.

Reference:
Szidat ( 1964 )
.

Maritrema bonaerensis Etchegoin & Martorelli, 1997 Hosts
:
Larus maculipennis Lichtenstein
,
L. dominicanus Lichtenstein
,
L. atlanticus Olrog. Site
of infection: intestine.
Localities: Mar Chiquita coastal lagoon and Orense beach, Buenos Aires Province.

Life history: Hi 1 :
Heleobia australis australis (d'Orbigny)
(natural host). Hi 2 :
Cyrtograpsus angulatus Dana
(natural and experimental host),
Chasmagnathus granulata Dana.
(natural host); metacercariae in hepatopancreas.
Material deposited: MLP , 3661 a–b, 4583 ; USNPC , 87019, 87020 .

References:
Etchegoin & Martorelli ( 1997 a)
,
Cremonte et al. ( 1999 )
.

bibRefCitation.author: Cremonte
bibRefCitation.refString: Cremonte, F. & Martorelli, S. R. (1998) Description of a new species of Maritrema (Digenea: Microphallidae) in Larus dominicanus (Aves: Laridae) from Buenos Aires coast, Argentina. Folia Parasitologica, 45, 230 - 232.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Host:
Larus dominicanus Lichtenstein .
Site of infection: intestine.
Locality: Orense beach, Buenos Aires Province.
Material deposited: MLP , 3955–3956 ; IPCAS , D­ 405 .

Reference:
Cremonte & Martorelli ( 1998 )
.

Host:
Himantopus melanurus Vieillot.
Site of infection: intestine.

Locality: Mar Chiquita coastal lagoon, Buenos Aires Province. Life history: Hi 1 :
Heleobia conexa (Gaillard)
(natural host); metacercariae in hepatopancreas and gonads. Material deposited: MLP , 3100 D­ 3102 D

Reference:
Martorelli ( 1991 )
.

Natural hosts:
Himantopus melanurus Vieillot
,
Pardirallus sanguinolentus sanguinolentus (Swainson)
,

Experimental host:
Mus musculus L.
Site of infection: intestine, ceca.

Localities: Mar Chiquita coastal lagoon and Los Talas, Buenos Aires Province. Life history: Hi 1 :
Heleobia conexa (Gaillard)
,
H . parchappei (d’Orbigny)
(natural hosts). Hi 2 :
Cyrtograpsus angulatus Dana
,
Chasmagnathus granulata Dana
(natural hosts); metacercariae in hepatopancreas;
Palaeomonetes argentinus
Nobili (natural and experimental host); metacercariae in muscles, gonads and connective tissue.

Material deposited: MLP , adult: 1319 C, metacercariae: 1319 D. References:
Martorelli ( 1986 a
,
1986 b
,
1989 a
),
Martorelli & Schuldt ( 1990 )
,
Etchegoin et al. ( 1996 )
.

Hosts:
Phalacrocorax brasilianus (Gmelin)
,
Larus dominicanus Lichtenstein . Locality
: Fracasso beach, San José Gulf, Chubut Province. Site of infection: intestine.
Material deposited: MLP , 4868 .

Reference:
Cremonte & Etchegoin ( 2002 )
.
